typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Employee_Id as string,
		Employee_Name as string,
		Designation_Name as string,
		Designation_Id as string,
		Designation_Id_Int as string,
		Group_Name as string,
		Level_Name as string,
		Department_Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deployable as string,
		Type as string,
		Location as string,
		Category as string,
		Status as string,
		Contribution as string,
		Deleted as string,
		Sub_Departments as string,
		ProjectIds as string,
		AccountIds as string,
		AccountNames as string,
		ActiveSowCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Employee_Id
	)) ~> ParqSource
ParqSource filter(Designation_Name=="Manager",
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		Employee_Id
	)) ~> ManagersFilter
ManagersFilter sink(input(
		Employee_Id as string,
		Employee_Name as string,
		Designation_Name as string,
		Designation_Id as string,
		Designation_Id_Int as string,
		Group_Name as string,
		Level_Name as string,
		Department_Name as string,
		Id as string,
		Deployable as string,
		Type as string,
		Location as string,
		Category as string,
		Status as string,
		Contribution as string,
		Deleted as string,
		Sub_Departments as string,
		ProjectIds as string,
		AccountIds as string,
		AccountNames as string,
		ActiveSowCount as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		AccountNames
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Target
